TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class ServicedComponent : ContextBoundObject, IDisposable, System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch, System.EnterpriseServices.IServicedComponentInfo

.class public auto ansi abstract serializable ServicedComponent extends System.ContextBoundObject implements class System.EnterpriseServices.IRemoteDispatch, class System.EnterpriseServices.IServicedComponentInfo, class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class ServicedComponent Inherits ContextBoundObject Implements IDisposable, IRemoteDispatch, IServicedComponentInfo
public ref class ServicedComponent abstract : ContextBoundObject, IDisposable, System::EnterpriseServices::IRemoteDispatch, System::EnterpriseServices::IServicedComponentInfo
type ServicedComponent = class inherit ContextBoundObject interface IRemoteDispatch interface IDisposable interface IServicedComponentInfo

summary.span: 表示所有使用 COM+ 服務之類別的基底類別。

span.span: Represents the base class of all classes using COM+ services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在某些情況下，衍生自的類別下執行 COM + 應用程式中的可能會停止回應。Under certain conditions, a class that is derived from that runs in a COM+ application may stop responding. 這個問題被因活動死結。This problem is caused by an Activity deadlock. 活動可以在多執行緒應用程式上發生死結，因為非同步清除的元件參考。Activities can deadlock on multithreaded applications because of an asynchronous cleanup of component references. 若要解決這個問題，請呼叫方法，當您完成使用物件衍生自。To work around this problem, call the method when you complete work with objects derived from . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb; en-us-我們; 327443](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;327443)。For more information, see [http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;327443](http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;en-us;327443). > [!NOTE] > 用戶端程式碼必須呼叫`Dispose`上 serviced 元件，以確保正常運作。Client code must call `Dispose` on serviced components to ensure proper operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何公開為設定的 COM 元件的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to expose a class as a configured COM component. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Basic/CPP/calculator.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Basic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Basic/CS/calculator.cs#1)] 若要部署此類別做設定的 COM 元件，您必須產生強式金鑰、 編譯為程式庫、 類別和登錄程式庫。To deploy this class as a configured COM component, you must generate a strong key, compile the class as a library, and register the library. 這三個步驟被透過下列三個命令。These three steps are accomplished by the following three commands. ``` sn -k Calculator.snk csc /t:library Calculator.cs regsvcs Calculator.dll ```

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 終結物件，並移除相關聯的 COM + 內容。Finalizes the object and removes the associated COM+ context. 建議您在記憶體回收行程釋放物件之前，明確釋放 COM + 物件和外部資源。It is recommended to explicitly release COM+ objects and external resources before the garbage collector frees the object. 如果外部資源不足或高成本，更好的效能可藉由在不再需要時，明確釋放 COM + 資源。If the external resource is scarce or expensive, better performance can be achieved by explicitly releasing COM+ resources when they are no longer needed. 明確控制由提供方法。Explicit control is provided by the method. 呼叫允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 如需有關，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

span.para: 覆寫方法，以自訂這個類別的處置邏輯。
Override the method to customize the dispose logic for this class.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 兩種資源，則為 ；只釋放 Unmanaged 資源，則為 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; otherwise, to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。如需有關如何實作，請參閱 [實作 Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。如需有關和，請參閱 [清理 Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) 上和 [覆寫 Finalize 方法] (http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最好是使用`Dispose`設計模式，而非。It is preferable to use the `Dispose` design pattern rather than .

MemberSignature.Value: void IServicedComponentInfo.GetComponentInfo (ref int infoMask, out string[] infoArray);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.EnterpriseServices.IServicedComponentInfo.GetComponentInfo(int32& infoMask, [out] string[]& infoArray) cil managed
Sub GetComponentInfo (ByRef infoMask As Integer, ByRef infoArray As String()) Implements IServicedComponentInfo.GetComponentInfo

virtual void System.EnterpriseServices.IServicedComponentInfo.GetComponentInfo(int % infoMask, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] cli::array <System::String ^> ^ % infoArray) = System::EnterpriseServices::IServicedComponentInfo::GetComponentInfo;

param.name: infoMask
param.span: 位元遮罩，其中 0x00000001 為 Serviced 元件處理序 ID 的索引鍵，0x00000002 為應用程式定義域 ID 的索引鍵，而 0x00000004 為 Serviced 元件遠端 URI 的索引鍵。

span.span: A bitmask where 0x00000001 is a key for the serviced component's process ID, 0x00000002 is a key for the application domain ID, and 0x00000004 is a key for the serviced component's remote URI.

param.name: infoArray
param.span: 字串陣列，可能包含下列任一項或所有項目，依次為：Serviced 元件處理序 ID、應用程式定義域 ID 和 Serviced 元件遠端 URI。

span.span: A string array that may contain any or all of the following, in order: the serviced component's process ID, the application domain ID, and the serviced component's remote URI.

summary.span: 取得 類別執行個體的某些資訊。

span.span: Obtains certain information about the class instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法未隸屬於已發行介面類別，並不需要其他地方實作。The method does not belong to the published interface of the class and does not need to be implemented elsewhere.
